subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Javier Castellano almost lost his Kentucky Derby ride on Gemologist when he was involved in a spill on Friday at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Ky.
snippet: Javier Castellano almost lost his Kentucky Derby ride on Gemologist when he was involved in a spill on Friday at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Ky.
